function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Management problems","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Distress, frustration, and loneliness due to confinement and loss of social/physical contact","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate assessment of virus viability","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate randomisation in randomised studies leading to biased results.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spreading inaccurate news","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clarity on exposure time calculation method","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Debates in the public sphere about the ’new normal’ and post-covid-19 world may impact attitudes towards green stimulus and sustainable policies.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of accurate risk assessment for routes could lead to high-risk paths being recommended, increasing the spread of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increasing reliance on digital technology for essential services","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unequal impact of traffic emission reductions","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of healthy building design","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Crowded housing leading to lack of privacy and inadequate sanitation facilities","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccuracy in estimating virus infection risk","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate access to nutritious foods for vulnerable populations","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases due to inadequate supplies during quarantine period leading to anxiety and frustration","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disease transmission from person-to-person","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contextualization of 605 photographs may lead to data privacy and ethical considerations regarding the nature of the information captured.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of strategic sensitivity and awareness of emergent trends in the environment","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Infection with sars-cov-2 leading to the development of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Housing precarity and poor neighborhood quality amplifying health risks","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Socio-economic impact of covid-19 leading to a global recession","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of telecommuting on the economy","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Internal risks","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of effective cleaning policies leading to increased spread of infection","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low score in dynamic envelope for case c","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate context parameters related to citizens’ distribution in the city","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Workforce distancing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper material recovery and reuse practices","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Susceptible-infected-removed model based on estimated case-detection rates","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased adoption of e-services and online retailing due to the pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate use of air cleaners and filters leading to ineffective control of virus spread","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of occupant exposure model","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rise in the amount of health data generated by iot devices","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate means of communication","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction of incentives to conserve wildlife and habitats central to tourism-based industries","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased transmission during winter period by 10%","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear impact of policy variables on infection growth rates immediately after deployment","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Raised indoor temperature and humidity","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Existing poor health conditions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to identify and isolate infected persons promptly","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in chamber air temperature","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited scope may result in overlooking the impact of greenspace on certain health outcomes, leading to incomplete evidence for decision-making.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of access to healthcare services","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Acceptability of social distancing as a temporary measure","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High energy consumption and climate change implications of widespread air conditioner use","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overcrowded living conditions leading to increased risk of contagious disease spread","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption of education, child development","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher dependency on public transport","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased dependence on telemedicine may lead to communication errors, misinterpretation of symptoms, and ineffective triage of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on ai-based diagnosis for contagious diseases may lead to algorithmic biases and inaccurate identification","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"}]}
